FA to CRITMATIC
Sastan parver jer gan,
Parpcelis gragok janipal...
Da?, da?, 조금 astronomical...
Thine abode, O Lord, within peace and calm.
I reach where he hath ready wedded,
Not doubted for another day.
Thine abode, O Lord, within peace and calm.
I reach where he hath ready wedded,
Not doubted for another day.
Thine abode, O Lord, within peace and calm.
Should we die young, O God,
Should we die young, O God,
Should we die young, O God,
In that seven most glorious days.
Ha ha ha!
